DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , single-dose , two-period , two-way , crossover study compare pharmacokinetics safety CKD-828 ( Fixed Dose Combination Tablet ) coadministration telmisartan s-amlodipine health volunteer .
DOC.criteria: A healthy volunteer 20 55 year old More 50kg within 20 % ideal body weight No congenital chronic diseases medical symptom Appropriate study examination ( laboratory test , ECG etc . ) within 4weeks prior first IP administration Signed informed consent form prior study participation . History relevant hypersensitivity drug Clinical significant disease medical history ( ex . hepato/cholangio , cardio , endo , hemato , onco , CNS etc . ) Active liver disease abnormal laboratory result ( AST ALT Total bilirubin > 1.5*ULN ) SBP < 90mmHg SBP > 150mmHg DBP < 50mmHg DBP > 100mmHg Creatinine clearance < 80mL/min A Disease ( ex.inflammatory intestinal disease , gastric duodenal ulcer , hepatic disease history , gastrointestinal surgery except appendectomy ) may influence absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug The evidence severe attack acute disease surgical intervention within 28 day prior first IP administration . A drug abuse heavy caffeine consumer ( 5 cup per day ) regular alcohol consumer ( 21 units/week ) heavy smoker ( 10 cigarette per day ) Taking ETC medicine oriental medicine within 14days Taking OTC medicine within 7days prior first IP administration Abnormal diet ( Especially , grapefruit juice within 7 day prior first IP administration ) may influence absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug
